sentence_after_role.source: Inferred as starting point since role adjustment not provided

notional_sentence.source:
I find the mathematical starting point of 10 years’ imprisonment appropriate in this case.
Fourth and fifth steps require me to consider whether there are any aggravating factors or any exceptional mitigating factors. I see no such factors in this case.

final_sentence.source: The defendant pleaded guilty at the earliest opportunity and is entitled to a full one-third discount. I will take the starting point of 10 years and reduce it by one-third. The defendant is sentenced to 6 years and 8 months’ imprisonment.
